name: Color Course (Freeranger)
description:
Color Course is a challenging 2D platformer with a twist: your character can only touch blocks in the same color as himself! Make your way through the world of colors, get past all obstacles such as ghosts, death blocks, or even moving  spike balls, complete all levels and defeat the boss. Good luck!

HOW TO PLAY

  • Move with A & D or the arrow keys
  • Jump with W, Space or the up arrow
  • And that's basically it!

RULES

  • Don't touch the wrong color (if you're red, you're only allowed to touch red blocks and neutral blocks)
  • Don't die! (You're of course allowed to, but it's not recommended as it makes it very difficult to win)

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS (RECOMMENDED, NOT 100% ACCURATE)

  • OS: Windows 7+
  • CPU: Dual core processor from AMD or Intel
  • RAM: 4 GB
  • GPU: Almost anything

If you find any bugs, please report them in the comments section!
